          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ljudski ples rašpla</string>
            <string language="en">Folk dance - \"rašpla\"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Volktanz - \"ra?pla \"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Danse de gens - \"ra?pla \"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dança dos povos - \"ra?pla \"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ballo della gente - \"ra?pla \"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λαϊκός χορός - \"ra?pla \"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Danza de la gente - \"ra?pla \"</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Priprava je namenjena 3. razredu, vendar so nekatere vsebine prezahtevne, zato jo lahko uporabite tudi v 4. razredu. Priporočam učenje v vrsti in ne krogu. Učenci naj bi se naučili nekaj figur plesa rašpla.</string>
            <string language="en">Organizing dance lesson for folk dance \"Rašplja\". Needed equipment, moves, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ljudski ples</string>
            <string language="en">folk dance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rašpla</string>
            <string language="en">rašpla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">šport</string>
            <string language="en">sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organisierende Tanzstunde für Völker tanzen 
\"Ra?plja \". benötigte Ausrüstung, Bewegungen...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La leçon de danse d'organisation pour des gens 
dansent le \"Ra?plja \". a eu besoin de matériel, mouvements...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A lição de dança organizando para povos dança
o \"Ra?plja \". necessitou o equipamento, movimentos...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lezione di ballo d'organizzazione per la gente
balla il \"Ra?plja \". ha avuto bisogno dell'apparecchiatura, 
movimenti...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργάνωση του μαθήματος χορού για το λαϊκό αναγκαίο 
εξοπλισμό \ "., κινήσεις χορού \"Ra?plja...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La lección de danza de ordenación para la gente
baila \"Ra?plja \". necesitó el equipo, movimientos...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Volktanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ra?pla</string>
          </keyword>
